subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Drew Hunter, an 18-year-old senior from Loudoun Valley High School in Virginia, broke Alan Webb’s 15-year-old high school indoor mile record with a time of 3 minutes 58.25 seconds at the Armory Track Invitational in Upper Manhattan.
snippet: Drew Hunter, an 18-year-old senior from Loudoun Valley High School in Virginia, broke Alan Webb’s 15-year-old high school indoor mile record with a time of 3 minutes 58.25 seconds at the Armory Track Invitational in Upper Manhattan.
